Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: Scenario seems fine, though the error would be from the CLI, not from the peer, as the CLI sends the package to the peer during the install command.

Action.author: latitiah
Action.body: The plan was to add these tests to ginkgo-based integration tests. Due to timing constraints, the tests have been added to the fabric-test behave-based tests: https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/29354/
